  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from django.conf import settings
  3. from django.db.models.base import ModelBase
  4. from cms.publisher.manager import PublisherManager
  5. from mptt.models import MPTTModelBase
  6. from cms.publisher.options import PublisherOptions
  9. class PageMetaClass(MPTTModelBase):
  10. def __new__(cls, name, bases, attrs):
  11. super_new = super(PageMetaClass, cls).__new__
  12. if not settings.CMS_MODERATOR:
  13. return super_new(cls, name, bases, attrs)
  15. if 'objects' in attrs:
  16. if not isinstance(attrs['objects'], PublisherManager):
  17. raise ValueError, ("Model %s extends Publisher, " +
  18. "so its 'objects' manager must be " +
  19. "a subclass of publisher.PublisherManager") % (name,)
  20. else:
  21. attrs['objects'] = PublisherManager()
  23. attrs['_is_publisher_model'] = lambda self: True
  25. # build meta object
  26. publisher_meta = attrs.pop('PublisherMeta', None)
  27. attrs['_publisher_meta'] = PublisherOptions(name, bases, publisher_meta)
  29. return super_new(cls, name, bases, attrs)
